enchantment.create.potato_recovery.desc: For the Potato Cannon, when enchanted gives the ammo a chance to drop as an item on hit. The chance of ammo being dropped is 25% for Potato Recovery 1, 33% for Potato Recovery 2, and 50% for Potato Recovery 3.
enchantment.create.capacity.desc: Applicable on the Copper Backtank for diving. Allows it to store more Pressurized Air for extended dives.
enchantment.simplyjetpacks.fuel_efficien: This somewhat rare enchantment decreases the amount of fuel used by jetpacks and flux packs when flying or being damaged.
enchantment.mahoutsukai.projector.desc: Right-click with an armor item on a mahoujin projector (block) to receive a special enchantment that displays that projector's settings.
enchantment.hunterillager.bounce.desc: Can be applied onto a Boomerang and each level increases the amount of times it can bounce.
enchantment.mythicbotany.hammer_mobility: Increases the attack speed of the Mj√∂llnir up to more than twice its base amount.
